trans-unit.source: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.
trans-unit.target: Содержит классы, предназначенные для поддержки взаимодействия элементов управления Windows Forms и WPF.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> Пространство имен содержит классы, которые разрешают взаимодействие между [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] и [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] технологий.

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications.
trans-unit.target: При использовании <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> классов, можно разместить [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] элементов управления в [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] страниц, и [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] элементов в [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-приложений на основе.

trans-unit.source: The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.
trans-unit.target: Ключевыми классами, реализующими возможности взаимодействия, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> и <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.

trans-unit.source: Which class you use depends on your control implementation:
trans-unit.target: Выбор используемого класса зависит от реализации элемента управления.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: Используйте <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> класса, если требуется использование [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] управления [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] страницы.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Используйте <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> класса, если требуется использование [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] элемент в [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-приложения.
